comment:
* Adapt a SAX1 AttributeList as a SAX2 Attributes object. * *

This class is in the Public Domain, and comes with NO * WARRANTY of any kind.

* *

This wrapper class is used only when Namespace support * is disabled -- it provides pretty much a direct mapping * from SAX1 to SAX2, except that names and types are * interned whenever requested.

methods.name: void setAttributeList(AttributeList qAtts)
methods.comment:
* Set the embedded AttributeList. * *

This method must be invoked before any of the others * can be used.

* * @param The SAX1 attribute list (with qnames).

methods.name: public int getLength()
methods.comment:
* Return the length of the attribute list.
     *
     * @return The number of attributes in the list.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Attributes#getLength

methods.name: public String getURI(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the Namespace URI of the specified attribute.
     *
     * @param The attribute's index.
     * @return Always the empty string.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Attributes#getURI

methods.name: public String getLocalName(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the local name of the specified attribute.
     *
     * @param The attribute's index.
     * @return Always the empty string.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Attributes#getLocalName

methods.name: public String getQName(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the qualified (prefixed) name of the specified attribute.
     *
     * @param The attribute's index.
     * @return The attribute's qualified name, internalized.

methods.name: public String getType(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the type of the specified attribute.
     *
     * @param The attribute's index.
     * @return The attribute's type as an internalized string.

methods.name: public String getValue(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the value of the specified attribute.
     *
     * @param The attribute's index.
     * @return The attribute's value.

methods.name: public int getIndex(String uri, String localName)
methods.comment:
* Look up an attribute index by Namespace name.
     *
     * @param uri The Namespace URI or the empty string.
     * @param localName The local name.
     * @return The attributes index, or -1 if none was found.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Attributes#getIndex(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

methods.name: public int getIndex(String qName)
methods.comment:
* Look up an attribute index by qualified (prefixed) name.
     *
     * @param qName The qualified name.
     * @return The attributes index, or -1 if none was found.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Attributes#getIndex(java.lang.String)

methods.name: public String getType(String uri, String localName)
methods.comment:
* Look up the type of an attribute by Namespace name.
     *
     * @param uri The Namespace URI
     * @param localName The local name.
     * @return The attribute's type as an internalized string.

methods.name: public String getType(String qName)
methods.comment:
* Look up the type of an attribute by qualified (prefixed) name.
     *
     * @param qName The qualified name.
     * @return The attribute's type as an internalized string.

methods.name: public String getValue(String uri, String localName)
methods.comment:
* Look up the value of an attribute by Namespace name.
     *
     * @param uri The Namespace URI
     * @param localName The local name.
     * @return The attribute's value.

methods.name: public String getValue(String qName)
methods.comment:
* Look up the value of an attribute by qualified (prefixed) name.
     *
     * @param qName The qualified name.
     * @return The attribute's value.

methodNames: public int getIndex(String uri, String localName)
public String getType(String uri, String localName)
public String getValue(String uri, String localName)
